medicines.medidesc: Medicines are chemicals or compounds used to cure, halt, or prevent disease; ease symptoms; or help in the diagnosis of illnesses.
Advances in medicines have enabled doctors to cure many diseases and save lives. These days, medicines come from a variety of sources.
